{"id":1470445674,"question_id":3380,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2Â months","timestamp":1733340377,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"703 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1470445674/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Shortest Subarray With OR at Least K II","memory":"90.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minimumSubarrayLength(vector<int>& nums, int k) {\n        int n = nums.size();\n        int left = 1;\n        int right = n;\n        while(left<right) {\n            int mid = left + (right-left)/2;\n            if(isOK(nums, mid, k))\n                right = mid;\n            else\n                left = mid+1;\n        }\n        if(!isOK(nums, left, k))\n            return -1;\n        return left;\n    }\n    bool isOK(vector<int>& nums, int len, int k) {\n        vector<int> count(32);\n        for(int i=0; i<len-1; i++) {\n            for(int j=0; j<32; j++)\n                count[j] += ( (nums[i]>>j) & 1 );\n        };\n        for(int i=len-1; i<nums.size(); i++) {\n            for(int j=0; j<32; j++)\n                count[j] += ( (nums[i]>>j) & 1 );\n            int sum = 0;\n            for(int j=0; j<32; j++)\n                if(count[j]>0) \n                    sum+= (1<<j);\n            if(sum>=k)\n                return true;\n            for(int j=0; j<32; j++)\n                count[j] -= ( (nums[i-len+1]>>j) & 1 );\n        }\n        return false;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"shortest-subarray-with-or-at-least-k-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
